30135.<%sL_SKILL_NAME>とは <%sL_TOOL_BASE_NAME>の:
<%sL_SKILL_NAME> is a roulette on the cover of <%sL_TOOL_BASE_NAME> that allows you to add special alchemical effects to your
equipment. However, the quality of the equipment to which you can apply the alchemy effect★It's the one with the...★You can add as many alchemical effects as there are... Choose the equipment you want to alchemize and the alchemical effect you want
to add, then spin the roulette needle... If the needle stops in the blue area, you've achieved an alchemy! If the needle stops in
the gray area, you've lost your alchemy. If you fail, you'll get a much weaker alchemy effect than the one you chose. To increase
the chance of alchemy success, you can use special skills... You can use alchemy skills as long as you have concentration. The
smelting equipment sold in the smelting guild does not require a roulette wheel. If the game is interrupted by a communication error
while you are smelting, the smelting will not succeed.

38829.<%sL_SKILL_NAME>の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\nルーレットの:
This will explain <%sL_SKILL_NAME>!
Spin the needle 'round, and if it stops on a blue area, the alchemy succeeds! The gray area means it will fail.
Before spinning, you can use Focus to activate various skills to increase your chances of successful alchemy.
After that, "Start" the roulette wheel, and the rest is up to Lady Luck herself!
More skills can be learned with a higher crafting level. May you have the best of luck!
